###Welcome! 

This is the landing page for the workshops offered to postgrad students in the Faculty of Natural and Agricultural Sciences at University of Pretoria.

Two workshop Series have been offered.

* Please follow the links below to the content. 
    + [Forestry and Agricultural Biotechnology Institute R Workshop Series](http://jmhulbert.github.io/r/fabi/)
        + February 14 - March 14, 2019.
    + [Faculty of NAS Biology R Workshop Series](http://jmhulbert.github.io/r/bio/)
        + April 23 - May 28, 2019.
